scripts.dev: concurrently -n worker,web -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w apps/worker" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/worker
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w apps/worker
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/web && npm run test -w apps/worker
